T02D2135:195a-0: @195a ` // ku la lo ka n'a tha'i byin rlabs dang rjes gnang bya ba'i rim pa bzhugs//
T02D2135:195a-2: # // 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2135:195a-3: rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug bsgom pa'i rim pa ni /
T02D2135:195a-4: gnas dben par stan bde ba la sems dpa'i skyil krung dam ji ltar bde bas 'dug la /
T02D2135:195a-6: sdug bsngal ba du mas gdungs pa'i sems can 'di rnams kyi don du /
T02D2135:195a-7: bdag gis rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug sgrub snyam
T02D2135:195a-8: du byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa sngon du 'gro
T02D2135:195a-9: bas / rang gi snying gar pam las padma dmar
T02D2135:195a-10: po'i lte bar aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2135:195a-11: bas / steng du ; / yi ge hr'i:'od zer 'phro ba dang bcas pa bsam /
T02D2135:195a-12: de las 'od zer lus kyi nang kun du 'phros pas /
T02D2135:195a-13: lus mi gtsang ba'i rdzas sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis
T02D2135:195a-14: gang ba snying po med par bsam pa lus rjes
T02D2135:195a-16: de la brten pa'i sems gzung 'dzin sna tshogs su
T02D2135:195a-17: snang ba ngo bos ma grub par bsams pa sems
T02D2135:195a-19: de dag las byung ba'i tshor ba bde sdug btang
T02D2135:195a-20: snyoms kyis bsdus pa rnams rang bzhin gyis ma grub
T02D2135:195a-21: par bsam pa tshor ba rjes su dran pa dang
T02D2135:195a-22: / de rnams kyis chos rang bzhin gyis spros pa'i
T02D2135:195a-23: mtha' dang bral bar bsam pa chos rjes su dran
T02D2135:195a-24: / pa rnams bsgom / de'i rjes su 'od zer
T02D2135:195a-25: rnams ba spu'i bu gnas phyogs kun du 'phros pas
T02D2135:195a-26: / pa rnams bsgom / / mdun gyi nam mkhar
T02D2135:195a-27: rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug sangs rgyas dang byang
T02D2135:195a-28: chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa spyan drangs /
T02D2135:195a-29: de la yid kyis phyag bya /
T02D2135:195a-30: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las 'phros pa'i mchod pa'i lha mo rnams kyis mchod /
T02D2135:195a-32: dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs mchi //
T02D2135:195a-33: sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags //
T02D2135:195a-34: 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang //
T02D2135:195a-35: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung //
T02D2135:195a-36: zhes don dran bzhin pas brjod //
T02D2135:195a-37: de nas sems can thams cad la byams pa dang /
T02D2135:195a-38: snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms te /
T02D2135:195a-40: de'i rjes su thugs ka'i sa bon las 'od zer
T02D2135:195a-41: 'phros pas mchod bya'i yul rnams dang snod bcud kyis
T02D2135:195a-43: rang gi lus kyang sa bon la thim par bsam //
T02D2135:195a-44: de nas sa bon yang nam mkha' la 'ja' yal ba bzhin du bsams la /
T02D2135:195b-0: @195b aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa aa ham /
T02D2135:195b-1: zhes rigs drug gi nga rgyal bya /
T02D2135:195b-2: de nas pam las padma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du
T02D2135:195b-3: h'um las khro bo'i rdo rje gdengs pa kha dog
T02D2135:195b-4: nag po lte ba la h'um gis mtshan par bsam
T02D2135:195b-5: / de las 'od zer dbang po dang gshin rje
T02D2135:195b-6: la sogs pa'i phyogs su kun du 'phros pas bdud
T02D2135:195b-7: dang bgegs la sogs pa tshar bcad nas /
T02D2135:195b-8: slar 'dus rdo rje'i sa gzhir ba dra ba gur
T02D2135:195b-9: bla re ye shes kyi me 'bar ba dang bcas
T02D2135:195b-11: de'i nang du h'um yongs su gyur pa las byung
T02D2135:195b-12: ba'i chos kyi 'byung gnas phyi dkar la nang dmar
T02D2135:195b-13: pa gdengs ka gyen du phyogs pa bsgom //
T02D2135:195b-14: de'i nang du pam las padma dmar po'i lte bar
T02D2135:195b-15: aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dkar po'i steng du
T02D2135:195b-16: hr'i:las byung ba lcags kyu dmar po'i 'od zer 'phro
T02D2135:195b-17: ba dang bcas pa'i hr'i:yig gis mtshan pa bsam /
T02D2135:195b-18: de yongs su gyur pa las rigs kyi 'jig rten
T02D2135:195b-19: dbang phyug yum dang bcas pa gnyis ka'ang sku mdog
T02D2135:195b-20: dmar po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa spyan gsum pa
T02D2135:195b-21: / phyag g-yas kyi dang po lcags kyu /
T02D2135:195b-22: gnyis pa rin po che dang mchog sbyin /
T02D2135:195b-23: g-yon gyi dang po na zhags pa dang bcas pas 'khyud pa /
T02D2135:195b-24: gnyis pa na padma dmar po 'dzin pa /
T02D2135:195b-25: mu tig dang nor bu'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa /
T02D2135:195b-26: 'od dpag tu med pa'i cod pan can sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02D2135:195b-27: shin tu dgyes pa'i nyams dang ldan pa bsgom /
T02D2135:195b-28: de nas thugs ka'i sa bon las 'od 'phros pas /
T02D2135:195b-29: rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug mdun gyi nam mkhar spyan drang /
T02D2135:195b-31: dza:h'um bam ho:zhes pas rang gi lus dang gnyis su
T02D2135:195b-32: med par bstim slar yang thugs kar yi ge gsum
T02D2135:195b-33: gyi sngags bsam / de dag las 'od zer 'phros pas /
T02D2135:195b-34: dbang gi lha spyan drangs mchod pas mchod /
T02D2135:195b-35: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi shinytsa tu m'am zhes dbang bskur bar gsol ba gdab /
T02D2135:195b-36: de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis ye shes kyi
T02D2135:195b-37: chus gang ba'i bum pas dbang bskur bar bsams la
T02D2135:195b-38: / lha'i sku la dmigs pa'i bsam gtan bya /
T02D2135:195b-39: de las skyon sngags kyi bzlas pa ni thugs ka nas /
T02D2135:195b-40: hr'i:h'um dza:zhes pa'i sngags kyi phreng ba zhal nas 'thon /
T02D2135:195b-41: yum gyi zhal du zhugs mkha' dang gsang ba'i rim
T02D2135:195b-42: pa bzhin brgyud nas thugs kar thim zhing 'khor ba
T02D2135:195b-43: la dmigs nas sems gzhan du ma 'phro bar bzlas
T02D2135:196a-1: / thun mtshams su mchod pa dang gtor ma btang zhing /
T02D2135:196a-2: gnas skabs thams cad du lha'i nga rgyal dang mi 'bral bar bya /
T02D2135:196a-3: rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa ni //
T02D2135:196a-5: de nyid kyi don grub ma hi mas blangs pa'i
T02D2135:196a-6: sgrub thabs las 'byung ba bzhin nyams su blang bar
T02D2135:196a-9: / de ltar na ring por mi thogs par 'jig rten dbang phyug gi skur 'gyur ro //
T02D2135:196a-10: rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug bsgom pa'i rim pa
T02D2135:196a-11: pandi ta chen po bi ma la shr'i'i zhal snga
